thread.title: Kiwis in deportation centres desperate

title: Kiwis in deportation centres desperate
text: Kiwis in deportation centres desperate Saturday, 3 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) New Zealand ers held in Australian detention centres without any indication of when they will be deported are frustrated and confused, a politician who has visited the centres says.Australian Greens' immigration spokeswoman Senator... The response to Kiwis being held in Australian deportation centres is inadequate and subservient, the Minister of Internal Affairs says.Peter Dunne, leader of... New Zealand Herald 4 days ago - Asia-Pacific Kiwis have been "caught up in the net" of a harsher policy and are likely facing tough conditions in deportation centres such as that on Christmas Island,... New Zealand Herald 5 days ago - Politics You Might Like
